home.name: zouhair boudeir
home.title: Full Stack Developer
home.description: Passionate developer specializing in modern web technologies. I create digital experiences that are fast, accessible, and user-friendly. Currently focused on React ecosystem and cloud technologies.

introduction.title: Hi there! I'm a passionate developer
introduction.description1: I'm a full-stack developer with a love for creating beautiful, functional, and user-centered digital experiences. With over 2 Month of experience in web development, I specialize in React, Node.js, and modern web technologies.
introduction.description2: When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or enjoying a good cup of coffee while brainstorming my next creative project.

portfolio.title: My Portfolio
portfolio.subtitle: Discover my web and mobile projects where innovation meets user experience

cta.text: Interested in my work? Feel free to contact me!

choufrap.title: Chouf Rap
choufrap.description: A music platform dedicated to rap, allowing artist discovery and music content sharing. This application offers an immersive experience with advanced streaming and community features.

qustainnaire.title: Qustainnaire
qustainnaire.description: Innovative web application for creating and managing interactive questionnaires with real-time analysis. Intuitive interface and detailed dashboards to track performance.

khayrat.title: Khayrat
khayrat.description: Charity mobile application facilitating donations and tracking of charitable actions. Secure and transparent for an optimal donation experience.

leafypaws.title: Leafy Paws
leafypaws.description: Mobile application connecting pet owners with care and veterinary services. Integrated geolocation and appointment system.

blog.title: My

reactHooks.title: Introduction to React Hooks – useState & useEffect
reactHooks.intro: React Hooks brought a major change in how we write code in React. Before, we had to use class components to handle state or lifecycle methods. But now, thanks to Hooks, everything is easier with function components.

useState.title: useState
useState.description: This Hook lets you manage state inside a regular component. For example, a counter:

useEffect.title: useEffect
useEffect.description: This Hook lets you handle lifecycle events like componentDidMount and componentDidUpdate. For example, if you want to fetch data from an API when the component mounts:

reactHooks.summary: useState = state management, useEffect = side effects (fetching data, timers, events…). These are the basics you'll use daily.

beginnerMistakes.title: Common Mistakes I Made as a Beginner and How I Learned From Them
beginnerMistakes.intro: When I started programming, I made a lot of mistakes that taught me valuable lessons.

mistake1.title: Mistake 1: Memorizing code without understanding it
mistake1.description: Solution: Focus on understanding and practice by building small projects.

mistake2.title: Mistake 2: Not using Git
mistake2.description: Solution: Learned GitHub – now every project is organized and accessible anywhere.

mistake3.title: Mistake 3: Switching between languages without focus
mistake3.description: Solution: I decided to focus on JavaScript and Laravel first, then learn other technologies later.

portfolioBuild.title: How I Built My Portfolio Step by Step
portfolioBuild.intro: This portfolio is one of the projects I'm proud of because it reflects my work.

step1.title: Step 1: Design
step1.description: I used Figma to design the interface, choose colors, and layout.

step2.title: Step 2: Code
step2.description: I used React + Tailwind CSS because they are easy for UI and fast to develop.

step3.title: Step 3: Content
step3.description: I divided the site into pages: About, Skills, Projects, Contact.

step4.title: Step 4: Improvements
step4.description: I added Dark Mode, animations, and responsive design to make it professional.

portfolioBuild.summary: The portfolio allows anyone to quickly see my work. It's an important showcase for any developer.

portfolioCV.title: How a Portfolio Can Boost Your CV
portfolioCV.intro: A portfolio isn't just a nice website – it's your tool to get a job or internship.

whatInclude.title: What it should include:
whatInclude.description: About: Short introduction about yourself. Skills: Technologies you have mastered. Projects: Your main projects with links. Contact: How people can reach you.

tips.title: Tips for a strong portfolio:
tips.description: Keep it simple and organized. Add screenshots of your projects. Include a 'Download CV' button. Make it responsive (works on phone & PC).

webTrends.title: Top Web Development Trends in 2025
webTrends.intro: The web world changes fast. Here are key trends for 2025 you should know:

ai.title: AI Integration
ai.description: Many websites now use artificial intelligence.

serverless.title: Serverless Architecture
serverless.description: People are moving to cloud solutions without traditional servers.

jamstack.title: Jamstack
jamstack.description: Building static websites + APIs is becoming very popular.

web3.title: Web3
web3.description: Using blockchain in web development is gradually emerging.

performance.title: Performance Optimization
performance.description: Focus on speed and user experience.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Ready to bring your ideas to life? Let's start a conversation about your next project.
contact.formSubtitle: Have a project in mind? I'd love to hear about it. Let's create something amazing together.
contact.subject: Subject
contact.callToAction: Don't hesitate to reach out. I'll reply as soon as possible and we can start creating something extraordinary together.
